title: Where are the OPL Finals being held this split?
body: I just wanted to know if/where/when the OPL finals are being held at a live arena this split, and if its possible to get tickets to the event?

replies.body: My understanding is that the money they spent on the OPL finals last year was redirected to help each team get into their own gaming houses this year, so there wouldn't be a live event final.
